00117 //----------------------------------------------------------
00118 void
00119 GrCamera::LookAt( const MVec3& pos, const MVec3& target )
00120 {
00121         B_ASSERT( pos != target );
00122 
00124         _dirty = true;
00125 
00127         _pos = pos;
00128 
00130         Look( pos - target );
00131 }
00132 
00133 void 
00134 GrCamera::Look( const MVec3& taintedDir )
00135 {
00136         MVec3 worldUp( 0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f );
00137 
00139         _dirty = true;
00140 
00142         MVec3 dir = taintedDir.Normalized();
00143 
00144         MVec3 right;
00146         if( Abs( dir.GetY() ) > 0.999f )
00147         {
00149                 right = MVec3(1, 0, 0);
00150         }
00151         else
00152         {
00153                 right = dir.Cross( worldUp );
00154                 right.Normalize();
00155         }
00156 
00158         MVec3 up = right.Cross( dir );
00159 
00161         _rot.SetCol( 0, right );
00162         _rot.SetCol( 1, up );
00163         _rot.SetCol( 2, -dir );
00164 }

00214 //----------------------------------------------------------
00215 void
00216 GrCamera::BuildRay( MRay& ray, float x, float y )
00217 {
00218         float px = 0.0f;
00219         float py = 0.0f;
00220         float ax = 0.0f;
00221         float ay = 0.0f;
00222 
00224         _proj.BuildRayOffsets( px, py, ax, ay, x, y );
00225 
00227         MVec3 start = GetPos();
00228         start += px * _rot.GetCol( 0 );
00229         start += py * _rot.GetCol( 1 );
00230         ray.SetStart( start );
00231 
00233         MVec3 lookDir = GetLookDir();
00234         lookDir += ax * _rot.GetCol( 0 );
00235         lookDir += ay * _rot.GetCol( 1 );
00236         ray.SetDir( lookDir );
00237 }
00238 
00239 //----------------------------------------------------------
00240 GrCamera
00241 GrCamera::BuildReflectedCamera( const MPlane& plane ) const
00242 {
00244         MMat4x4 reflectMat = plane.BuildReflectMatrix();
00245         MVec3 cameraPos = reflectMat.TransformCoord( _pos );
00246 
00248         MMat3x3 reflectRot;
00249         reflectMat.GetRotate( reflectRot );
00250 
00252         MMat3x3 cameraRot = reflectRot * _rot;
00253 
00255         GrCamera newCam;
00256         newCam.SetPos( cameraPos );     
00257         newCam.SetRot( cameraRot );     
00258         newCam.SetFarCull( _farCull );
00259         newCam.SetProjFOV( _proj.GetFOV() );
00260         newCam.SetProjFarClip( _proj.GetFarDist() );
00261         newCam.SetProjAspectRatio( _proj.GetAspect() );
00262 
00265         MPlane camSpacePlane = plane;
00266         camSpacePlane.TransformFast( newCam.GetViewMatrix(), newCam.GetNormalMatrix() );
00267         newCam.SetProjNearClip( camSpacePlane );
00268 
00270         return newCam;
00271 }
00272

00275 GrCamera::BuildWorldMatrix() const
00276 {
00277     return MMat4x4( GetRot(), GetPos() );

00337 GrCamera::operator = ( const GrCamera& rhs )

00340         SetRot( rhs.GetRot() );
00341         SetProj( rhs.GetProj() );
00342         return *this;

00345 //==========================================================
00347 //==========================================================
00348 
00349 //----------------------------------------------------------
00350 void
00351 GrCamera::UpdateMatrices() const
00352 {
00353         B_ASSERT( _dirty );
00354 //      if ( !_dirty )
00355 //              return;
00356 
00358         _dirty = false;
00359 
00361         const MMat4x4& projMatrix = _proj.GetMatrix();
00362 
00363         MMat3x3 transViewRot = _rot.Transposed();
00364 
00366         MVec3 invCamPos( -transViewRot.RotatePoint( _pos ) );
00367         _viewMatrix = MMat4x4( transViewRot, invCamPos );
00368 
00370         _normalRot = transViewRot;
00371 
00373         _viewProjMatrix = projMatrix * _viewMatrix;
00374         bool valid = _viewMatrix.Inverse( _invViewMatrix );
00375         B_ASSERT( valid );
00376 
00377         bool reflection = false;
00378 
00380 //      if ( ( _viewMatrix( 0, 0 ) * _viewMatrix( 1, 1 ) * _viewMatrix( 2, 2 ) ) < 0.0f )
00381 //              reflection = true;
00382 
00384         MVec4 row;
00385         MVec3 xAxis;
00386         MVec3 yAxis;
00387         MVec3 zAxis;
00388         _viewMatrix.GetRow( row, 0 );
00389         row.MakeVec3( xAxis );
00390         _viewMatrix.GetRow( row, 1 );
00391         row.MakeVec3( yAxis );
00392         _viewMatrix.GetRow( row, 2 );
00393         row.MakeVec3( zAxis );
00394 
00396         if ( xAxis.Cross( yAxis ).Dot( zAxis ) < 0.0f )
00397                 reflection = true;
00398 
00401         float right = reflection ? -_proj.GetAspect() : _proj.GetAspect();
00402         float left = reflection ? _proj.GetAspect() : -_proj.GetAspect();
00403         float top = 1.0f;
00404         float bottom = -1.0f;
00405 
00407         left *= -_proj.GetLeft();
00408         right *= _proj.GetRight();
00409         bottom *= -_proj.GetBottom();
00410         top *= _proj.GetTop();
00411 
00412         float fov = _proj.GetFOV();
00413 
00415         if ( fov > 0.0f )
00416         {
00417                 float tan = Tan( 0.5f * fov );
00418                 float nearDist = 1 / tan;
00419 
00421                 MVec3 bottomLeft( left, bottom, -nearDist );
00422                 MVec3 topLeft( left, top, -nearDist );
00423                 MVec3 topRight( right, top, -nearDist );
00424                 MVec3 bottomRight( right, bottom, -nearDist );
00425 
00426                 _invViewMatrix.TransformCoordFast( bottomLeft );
00427                 _invViewMatrix.TransformCoordFast( topLeft );
00428                 _invViewMatrix.TransformCoordFast( topRight );
00429                 _invViewMatrix.TransformCoordFast( bottomRight );
00430 
00431                 MVec3 lookDir = GetLookDir();
00432 
00434                 _frustum = GrFrustum( _pos, bottomLeft, topLeft, topRight, bottomRight, lookDir, 0.0f, _farCull );
00435         }
00436         else
00437         {
00438                 float halfWidth = 0.5f * _proj.GetWidth();
00439                 float halfHeight = 0.5f * _proj.GetHeight();
00440 
00442                 MPlane left( MVec3( 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f ), MVec3( -halfWidth, 0.0f, 0.0f ) );
00443                 MPlane right( MVec3( -1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f ), MVec3( halfWidth, 0.0f, 0.0f ) );
00444                 MPlane top( MVec3( 0.0f, -1.0f, 0.0f ), MVec3( 0.0f, halfHeight, 0.0f ) );
00445                 MPlane bottom( MVec3( 0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f ), MVec3( 0.0f, -halfHeight, 0.0f ) );
00446                 MPlane nearPlane( MVec3( 0.0f, 0.0f, -1.0f ), MVec3( 0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f ) );
00447                 MPlane farPlane( MVec3( 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f ), MVec3( 0.0f, 0.0f, -_farCull ) );
00448 
00450                 MMat3x3 invTrans;
00451                 _invViewMatrix.GetRotate( invTrans );
00452 
00454                 MVec3 lookDir = GetLookDir();
00455 
00457                 left.TransformFast( _invViewMatrix, invTrans );
00458                 right.TransformFast( _invViewMatrix, invTrans );
00459                 top.TransformFast( _invViewMatrix, invTrans );
00460                 bottom.TransformFast( _invViewMatrix, invTrans );
00461                 nearPlane.TransformFast( _invViewMatrix, invTrans );
00462                 farPlane.TransformFast( _invViewMatrix, invTrans );
00463 
00465                 MVec3 nearBottomLeft( -halfWidth, -halfHeight, 0.0f );
00466                 MVec3 nearTopLeft( -halfWidth, halfHeight, 0.0f );
00467                 MVec3 nearTopRight( halfWidth, halfHeight, 0.0f );
00468                 MVec3 nearBottomRight( halfWidth, -halfHeight, 0.0f );
00469 
00470                 MVec3 farBottomLeft( -halfWidth, -halfHeight, -_farCull );
00471                 MVec3 farTopLeft( -halfWidth, halfHeight, -_farCull );
00472                 MVec3 farTopRight( halfWidth, halfHeight, -_farCull );
00473                 MVec3 farBottomRight( halfWidth, -halfHeight, -_farCull );
00474 
00475                 _invViewMatrix.TransformCoordFast( nearBottomLeft );
00476                 _invViewMatrix.TransformCoordFast( nearTopLeft );
00477                 _invViewMatrix.TransformCoordFast( nearTopRight );
00478                 _invViewMatrix.TransformCoordFast( nearBottomRight );
00479                 _invViewMatrix.TransformCoordFast( farBottomLeft );
00480                 _invViewMatrix.TransformCoordFast( farTopLeft );
00481                 _invViewMatrix.TransformCoordFast( farTopRight );
00482                 _invViewMatrix.TransformCoordFast( farBottomRight );
00483 
00485                 _frustum = GrFrustum( _pos, lookDir, nearBottomLeft, nearTopLeft, nearTopRight,
00486                         nearBottomRight, farBottomLeft, farTopLeft, farTopRight, farBottomRight, 0.0f, _farCull );
00487         }
00488 }
